name: "Informant" Argo the Rat
text: 【CONT】 Your events can be played from your hand without fulfilling color requirements. 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Lately, you've been taking big risks with your level-raising.

name: Longing Osmanthus, Alice
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your stock into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: My mouth, my throat, my heart all remember.

name: A Thousand-Year Journey, Asuna
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Anniversary》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock. 【AUTO】 During this card's battle, when the damage you received is canceled, you may return this card to your hand.
flavorText: Come on, let's go, Kirito!

name: Unbreakable Hope, Asuna
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other "The Power of Divine Authority, Kirito" get +1500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects." 【ACT】 Resonate [(1) Reveal 1 "The Power of Divine Authority, Kirito" in your hand & 【REST】 this card] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Anniversary》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Welcome back, Kirito.

name: Newbie Gamer, Asuna
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 event from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. If you put 1 card into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Amazing... it's like the real thing!

name: Shout Echoing Across the Battlefield, Alice
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Anniversary》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Guardian of Human Realm" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have 4 or more other 《Anniversary》 characters, choose up to 1 "Alicization" or character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose up to 1 《Anniversary》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: My name is Alice!

name: Together With You, Asuna
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other "Towards Tomorrow Together, Mito" get +1000 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play "Backup" from their hand." 【CONT】 All of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 characters get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 character with level equal to or lower than your level in your hand, put it in any position of your stage, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Thank you.

name: Piling Up Emotions, Asuna & Kirito
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(3) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "《Mother's Rosario》" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, put the top 11 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and deal 2 damage X times to your opponent. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Kirito: "Let's go, Asuna!"

name: Rising Expectations, Argo
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when damage dealt by this card is canceled, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the level of that card +1. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Reliable Information" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 3 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: So those two are the top players at this point?

name: Asuna's Commanding Strength
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Anniversary》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "The World of Swords" is in your climax area, and you have 4 or more other 《Anniversary》 characters, you may choose 1 《Anniversary》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock. If you put it into your stock, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I'll protect you. So you protect me, okay?

name: Straight Path, Alice
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Anniversary》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [Return 2 《Anniversary》 characters from your waiting room to your deck & Shuffle your deck] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Flip over 3 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. If "Shout Echoing Across the Battlefield, Alice" is revealed among those cards, choose 1 "Shout Echoing Across the Battlefield, Alice" in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage.
flavorText: Your heart can't be tainted by anyone.

name: Self-Sacrificing, Alice
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Anniversary》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 2, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Take your time eating, all right?

name: Moment of Healing, Asuna
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Moment of Healing, Asuna" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: Into the Light, Alice & Eugeo
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "The Power of Divine Authority, Kirito" get the following ability. "【AUTO】 [(4) Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] At the end of this card's attack, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top 17 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards." (Damage may be canceled) 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 other 《Anniversary》 character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock.
flavorText: Alice: "Yes. Let's leave the rest to those two."

name: Game Master, Kayaba
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of characters your opponent has ×1000. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot be returned to hand or put into memory."
flavorText: This may be a game, but it's not something you play.

name: 《Aria of a Starless Night》 Asuna
text: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Floating Castle Aincrad" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: We're already friends without doing that!

name: A New Promise, Asuna
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: We are going to clear this game, aren't we?

name: 【Aria of a Starless Night】 Asuna
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavorText: Sword Art Online.

name: Battle Stance, Asuna
text: 【CONT】 Experience During your turn, if the total level of the cards in your level is 5 or higher, this card gets +6000 power.
flavorText: We have to surround the boss, or there won't be a range attack!

name: Game of Life or Death
text: This card can be played from your hand without fulfilling color requirements. Choose 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put it into your stock. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: Asuna: "I don't want to lose to this game... to this world."

name: Floating Castle Aincrad
text: Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total number of in the trigger icons of those cards.
flavorText: Kabaya: "I wish you luck, players."

name: Guardian of Human Realm
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: All those who stand before me, brace for my holy authority to vanquish every last one of you!

name: Reliable Information
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: You're seriously going to try and solo it?

name: The World of Swords
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: Bond Between Siblings, Leafa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: I was happy that I was able to help you in your world.

name: "Mother's Rosario" Yuuki
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "《Mother's Rosario》" is in your climax area, and you have 3 or more other 《Anniversary》 characters, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 "Inherited Sword Technique" or 《Anniversary》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Thank you, Asuna

name: Towards Tomorrow Together, Mito
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another character with "Asuna(アスナ)" in its card name, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Experience [(2) Put 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 character from your hand into your waiting room] At the end of this card's attack, if "Final Push" is in your climax area, and "Towards Tomorrow Together, Mito" is in your level, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose this card and 1 of your "Together With You, Asuna" or "《Aria of a Starless Night》 Kirito", exchange them, and those characters get +1 soul until end of turn. (The cards' stateｓ do not change)
flavorText: Asuna!!

name: 【Aria of a Starless Night】 Misumi
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0) 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you play an event, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Who knew they were livestreaming it outside the shop?

name: Undefeated Super Swordsman, Yuuki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent has 1 or less characters in their center stage, you may choose 1 cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it into their waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 climax from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. If you put 1 card into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Oookaaay. If that's what yer sayin'...

name: Maidens of the Holy Night
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Happy Christmas!" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Anniversary》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, perform the following action 2 times. "Put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Anniversary》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of that card."

name: Beta Tester, Mito
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, all of your characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."
flavorText: Because I've been prepping for it for a long time.

name: Promise to Protect, Mito
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Experience [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Promise at Dusk" is in your climax area, and the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 3 "Game of Life or Death" or 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I'll protect you no matter what, all right?

name: Bewitching Smile, Yuna
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Anniversary》 characters. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or deck, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Bewitching Smile, Yuna", put it in any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Ephemeral Memories" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Anniversary》 character, this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -2 soul."
flavorText: Too bad!

name: After School Together, Misumi & Asuna
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your back stage.
flavorText: Misumi: "If I braided it in the back, it would be even cuter. I'm sure you'd look great."

name: The Real Songstress, Yuna
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] During your climax phase, when "Ephemeral Memories" is placed on your climax area, if your level is 2 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "Bewitching Smile, Yuna" in your hand, and put it in the stage position that this card was in.
flavorText: Eiji, sorry to keep you waiting!

name: Innocent Smile, Yuuki
text: 【ACT】 [(1) Put this 【STAND】 card into your memory] Choose 1 "《Zekken》 Yuuki" or "Overcoming Fear, Asuna" or "Unbending Fighting Spirit, Asuna" or "Piling Up Emotions, Asuna & Kirito" or ""Mother's Rosario" Yuuki" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Hehe.

name: In a Party Dress, Sortiliena
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all players perform the following action. "If your memory has 5 or more cards, choose 4 cards in your memory, and put all cards in your memory except those cards into your waiting room." 【ACT】 [(1) Return 2 characters from your waiting room to your deck & Put this card into your waiting room & Shuffle your deck] Choose 1 《Anniversary》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Don't be so nervous.

name: Internal Conflict, Yuuki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the cost of this card's battle opponent is 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 《Anniversary》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Sometimes, you gotta fight to get your point across.

name: The Best Parts of the Game, Mito
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavorText: Doing this kind of research—

name: Refreshed Feelings, Fanatio
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: It's been a long time, Alice. I'm glad you're well.

name: Entrusted Hopes, Cardinal
text: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】) 【ACT】 [【REST】 2 of your characters] This card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock."
flavorText: Kirito, you must believe.

name: Leafa's Pure Wish
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or more "Bond Between Siblings, Leafa", this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, all of your characters get +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: I'll be waiting... I'll be waiting for you to come home for real.

name: Great Fortune! Suguha
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets +1 soul until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

name: Deep Regrets, Mito
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 from your stage into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Until We Meet Again, Yuuki & Asuna
text: 【CONT】 Memory If this card is in your memory, this card's card name is also regarded as "Together With a Memory, Asuna & Yuuki(思い出とともに アスナとユウキ)". 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Anniversary》 character from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your memory] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Asuna: "And then we can sit and talk and you can tell me where you've been."

name: Leveling Up Together, Mito
text: 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less other characters, this card gets +1 level and +2500 power.
flavorText: Let's get a little more work in!

name: Relaxed Time, Misumi
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory." 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: You're the only opponent I need, Asuna.

name: Wielder of Time-Splitting Sword, Bercouli
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 of your opponent's level 1 or higher characters. If you do, your opponent chooses 1 level X or lower character in their waiting room, and exchanges them. X is equal to the level of the character you chose -1.
flavorText: It's called the Time-Splitting Sword, the blade that pierces time.

name: Misumi Tozawa
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose 1 of your 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 characters, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Morning.

name: Unyielding, Leafa
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Anniversary》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Anniversary》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: I won't fall, either.

name: Assistants, Ronie & Tiese
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Assistants, Ronie & Tiese" get +3000 power.
flavorText: Tiese: "I have completed today's cleaning!"

name: Conquering Floor 1's Boss, Mito
text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, all players cannot play "Backup" from their hands. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: Inherited Sword Technique
text: 【CXCOMBO】 Choose 1 "《Mother's Rosario》" in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Oh c'mon...! 'I want you to have it.~

name: 《Mother's Rosario》
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 character with in its trigger icon in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose up to 2 of your characters, and those characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Yaaa!!!

name: Final Push
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Asuna & Mito: "Switch!"

name: Happy Christmas!
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 level 1 or lower character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Promise at Dusk
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: So let's try to clear the game together. And then let's go home together.

name: Ephemeral Memories
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Yuna: "It could be that it was all just a dream."

name: Always Friendly, Silica
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of characters your opponent has. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Hill of Memories" is in your climax area, and you have 4 or more other 《Anniversary》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent, choose up to 2 cards in your opponent's waiting room, return them to their deck, and your opponent shuffles their deck. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: And about the one day in my life that I had a big brother.

name: Like a Younger Sister, Silica
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level X or lower 《Anniversary》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the number of "Always Friendly, Silica" in your waiting room. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 "Always Friendly, Silica" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: If I told him I wanted to talk a little more, would he laugh at me?

name: Mace User, Lisbeth
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Anniversary》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Awakened Feelings" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Anniversary》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, you may return this card to your hand."
flavorText: When I finish a sword I can be satisfied with, I'll tell him how I feel.

name: Top Class Blacksmith, Lisbeth
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Your opponent puts all of their stock into their waiting room, and puts the same number of cards from the top of their deck into their stock." "All of your characters get +4000 power until end of turn."
flavorText: You'll always be welcome at Lisbeth's Smith Shop!

name: Cute Mischief, Silica
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, perform the following action 2 times. "Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room." 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you do not have another character in your back stage, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put that character in any position of your back stage.
flavorText: Wah!

name: Irrepairable, Lisbeth
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 0 or lower characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put it into your stock. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: Ugwahhh!

name: Spring Blooms, Rika & Suguha & Keiko
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: 《Death Gun》 Alongside Fear
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Anniversary》 character, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -6000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 During this card's battle, when the damage you received is canceled, you may return this card to your hand.
flavorText: You talk a good game, but...

name: Yearning, Silica & Lisbeth
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room & Put 1 other character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Mysterious Smile, Administrator
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your level and 1 card in your waiting room, and exchange them. 【ACT】 [Put this card into your clock] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Now, show me.

name: He Who Seeks, Steals, and Robs, Gabriel
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1500 power for each character in your opponent's back stage. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: Souls.

name: Silica's Gratitude
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Anniversary》 character, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -1 level until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 2 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's memory.
flavorText: You're a good person! You saved me!

name: Heart's Warmth, Asuna & Lisbeth
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get the following ability. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step." 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Lisbeth: "You've found something important to you."

name: Twisted Love, Vassago
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2500 power for each character in your opponent's back stage. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 red card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: How much I love that guy.

name: Hill of Memories
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Silica: "I'm so glad..."

name: Awakened Feelings
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: I like you!

name: Flower Crown of Happiness, Yui
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Anniversary》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Anniversary》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Come on, Papa, hurry.

name: GGO's Strongest Sniper, Sinon
text: 【CONT】 Experience During your turn, if the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 other 《Anniversary》 character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Anniversary》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card at the bottom of your deck] Choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: You owe me a fight, so you better stay alive.

name: The Power of Divine Authority, Kirito
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Memory When this card attacks, if "Night-Sky Blade" is in your climax area, you have another 《Anniversary》 character, and "Alicization" is in your memory, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the cost of that card +1. (Climax are regarded as 0 cost. Damage may be canceled)
flavorText:
I definitely won't let your feelings,
or all the blood and tears you shed, go to waste.

name: 《Aria of a Starless Night》 Kirito
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavorText: So we've got to go home alive today, okay?

name: "Stay Cool" Eugeo
text: 【CONT】 Memory If this card in your memory, all of your "The Power of Divine Authority, Kirito" get the following ability. "【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character facing this card, and that character gets -2 soul until end of turn." 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other 《Anniversary》 characters, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if your memory has 2 or less cards, you may put this card into your memory.
flavorText: That's right, Kirito. Don't cry. Stay cool.

name: 2.5 Years of Memories, Eugeo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Anniversary》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position of the stage."
flavorText: Kirito...

name: Familial Love, Asuna & Yui
text: 【CONT】 This card can be played from your hand without fulfilling color requirements. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Anniversary》 characters, you may choose 1 《Anniversary》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Anniversary》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Anniversary》 characters you have ×1000.
flavorText: Asuna: "We'll be together forever, Yui-chan."

name: 《Unlimited Flight Ability》 Sinon
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. Deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Apparently, it's a unique power gifted to the Solus account.

name: Moonlit Night Swordsmen, Asuna & Kirito
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Return this card to your hand] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other characters, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Kirito: "SAO is no ordinary game."

name: Memory Fragment, Kirito
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your memory has 2 or less cards, you may choose 1 ""Stay Cool" Eugeo" in your waiting room, and put it into your memory. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Right here forever.

name: Valuable Strength, Kirito
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 other 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: You can become stronger.

name: Bullet of Determination, Sinon
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When ""Cold-Hearted Sniper"" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and all of your characters are 《Anniversary》, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "This card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card attacks, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step."" "Choose 1 of your opponent's level 1 or higher characters, your opponent chooses 1 level X or lower character in their waiting room, and exchanges them. X is equal to the level of the character you chose by this effect -1."
flavorText: He won't even know what hit him.

name: 【Aria of a Starless Night】 Kazuto
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 character attacks, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: In a Bad Mood, Shino
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Anniversary》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 During this card's attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.
flavorText: It's like... yeah, he pisses me off.

name: 《Black Swordsman》 Kirito
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may choose 1 of your 《Anniversary》 characters, and move it to the open middle position of your center stage. 【ACT】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Choose 1 level X or lower 《Anniversary》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the number of "The World of Swords" in your waiting room.
flavorText: No, I'm going to win. I'm going to win and end this game.

name: 《Ordinal Scale》 Silica & Asuna & Kirito
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, your opponent declares 0 or 1 or 2 or 3. Put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, and if that card's level is the number your opponent declared, you draw up to X cards. X is equal to the number your opponent declared +1. (Climax are regarded as level 0) 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.

name: Assault Team, Agil
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 character from your hand into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of characters your opponent has.
flavorText: My name is Agil.

name: Giving Advice, Sinon
text: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put this card into your memory. If you do, at the beginning of your next draw phase, choose 1 "Giving Advice, Sinon" in your memory, and put it in any position of your stage.
flavorText: I guess when it comes to combat, everyone's got their own style...

name: Even if It's a Trap, Klein
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1500 power for each character in your opponent's back stage.
flavorText: If I gotta chance to do some good for someone, I will!

name: Happy Family, Asuna & Yui
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Anniversary》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to that character's soul ×1000.
flavorText: Yui: "I'm going, too!"

name: For the World He Loves, Eugeo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of characters your opponent has ×2000.
flavorText: It's because you love the people you met here.

name: 《Coat of Midnight》 Kirito
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 5500, Level 2 [(2) Reveal this card in your hand & Put it at the bottom of your deck] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +5500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: A beater... that's a good name.

name: Alicization
text: Search your deck for up to 1 《Anniversary》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Put this card into your memory.

name: SYSTEM ALERT
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose up to 2 of your 《Anniversary》 or 《Integrity Knight》 or 《Noble》 characters, and those characters get the following abilities until end of turn. "【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -2 soul." "【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may return this card to its previous stage postion as 【REST】." Put this card into your clock.
flavorText: Eugeo: "If upholding such a law is the "right" thing to do..."

name: Night-Sky Blade
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Starburst... Stream!

name: "Cold-Hearted Sniper"
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Yer dead.

name: Unexpected Healing, Asuna
text: 【AUTO】 When your other "Conquering Floor 1's Boss, Kirito" attacks, if there are no markers underneath that character, you may put this card face up underneath that character as a marker. If you do, that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [Put the top card of your stock into your clock & 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 level 1 or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: To think that such wonderful bathtubs exist in this world!

name: Obsessed With Games, Misumi
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +2 level until end of turn.
flavorText: Asuna: "You should've seen your face then!"

name: Rare Item Obtained, Mito
text: 【CONT】 If your opponent has a level 3 or higher character, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If this card is in your center stage, all of your 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 characters get +1500 power.
flavorText: I snagged the item!

name: Conquering Floor 1's Boss, Kirito
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +10000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When your other "Unexpected Healing, Asuna" is put underneath this card as a marker, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: The road to either death or glory, huh?{

name: "Augmented Reality" Kirito & Asuna
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Ordinal Scale, activate!

name: Dazzling, Alice
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】. 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, this card gets +2000 power.
flavorText: As I thought, I can only ask you with my sword.

name: Between Virtual and Real
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose 1 character in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot deal damage to a player."

name: 《Mother's Rosario》
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Like the sun.

name: Intersecting Feelings, Asuna
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】." 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Anniversary》 or 《Progressive》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: The boss isn't done yet.

name: Intersecting Feelings, Mito
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", all of your characters with "Asuna(アスナ)" in their card names get 《Weapon》 until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 1 [(1) Reveal this card in your hand & Put this card at the bottom of your deck] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I won't let you die, no matter what.
